snippet: A group of American creative talents, including Pharrell Williams, Kelly Wearstler and Rafael de Cárdenas, created their own versions of the iconic Bourgie table lamp, which are on view at the Italian design brand’s SoHo store this week.
abstract: A group of American creative talents, including Pharrell Williams, Kelly Wearstler and Rafael de Cárdenas, created their own versions of the iconic Bourgie table lamp, which are on view at the Italian design brand’s SoHo store this week.

headline.main: At Kartell, There’s Still a Great Future in Plastics
